title: Don’t Waste the Pain
verse_text: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him.
insight: What breaks you today may build someone else tomorrow.
one_minute_win: Write down one past pain and ask: 'How has God used this for good?'
declaration: My pain is not wasted—it’s woven.
